Title: Map Service API
Description: A Silverlight 2.0 Library to control map services such as Google Maps and Microsoft Virtual Earth with minimal JavaScript
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Silverlight 2.0 Library to control map services such as Google Maps and Microsoft Virtual Earth with minimal JavaScript


This is work in progress. I plan to focus on getting the Google map functionality including Google Earth 3d to a good point before I go back and implement the Virtual Earth stuff.

Currently working

Google
  • Marker
  • OnMapClick
  • OnMapViewChange
  • OnMapZoom
  • OnShapeClick
  • Map types Satellight, Hybrid, Street
